Authenticate a user and set a JWT in HTTP-only cookie

Resend email verification link if the user is not verified
Reset password using a one-time token sent by email
Verify user email using a token sent after registration

get.description: Retrieve the profile of the authenticated user

patch.description: Update the profile of the authenticated user

get.summary: List all projects for the current user
List all tasks for the current user

get.summary: List all tasks by project for the current user

Retrieve details of a specific user by ID (Admin only)

put.description: Update user details by ID (Admin only)

delete.description: Delete a specific user by ID (Admin only, cannot delete admin users)
